job_history.work_description: Determining financial objectives. Designing & implementing systems, policies & procedures to facilitate internal financial control. Preparing Annual Budget and forecasting trends. Developing reports for top management summarizing the business financial position in areas of income, expenses, capital usage and cash flows, and coordinate the preparation of strategic plans, budgets and financial forecast. Developing and updating accounting, finance and management policies and procedures. Effective Cash Flow Management Monitoring budgets and comparing them with actual cost and revenues related to production, marketing and capital.

Supervised day to day activities of the Finance Department for the Company. Prepared monthly provisions and closing of Accounts & also to prepare MIS reports Prepared and reviewing of financial statements, budget, forecast, monthly business performance, revenue collections, bank reconciliation and sales analysis, etc.

Maintained basic accounts, book keeping Reconciliation of Bank statements Ledger entries, journal entries Customer relations Invoice entries and cross checking Prepared and analyzed financial statements Making Cheques for parties Maintained Ledger for Sales, purchase Making Vouchers & Entries in Computer Cash Handling & Preparation of Day Book.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in determining financial objectives, preparing annual budgets, and forecasting trends, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has a long history of preparing and reviewing financial statements, budgets, forecasts, and monthly business performance reports, suggesting expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Cash Flow Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in effective cash flow management, monitoring budgets, and comparing them with actual costs and revenues, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in preparing and managing budgets, including coordinating the preparation of strategic plans, budgets, and financial forecasts, suggesting expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has a long history of analyzing financial statements, preparing and reviewing financial reports, and making financial decisions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in maintaining basic accounts, bookkeeping, reconciling bank statements, and preparing financial statements, suggesting expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience in supervising day-to-day activities of the finance department and leading teams, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in designing and implementing systems, policies, and procedures to facilitate internal financial control, suggesting expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Bank Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has experience in reconciling bank statements, indicating strong proficiency in bank reconciliation.

skills.name: Financial Forecasting
skills.explanation: Has experience in preparing financial forecasts, including forecasting trends and coordinating the preparation of strategic plans, suggesting expert-level proficiency.
